item.description:
November: Body Unlimited... a healing modality that enables your body to use its natural healing energy.

December: Give a Reading/Get a Reading. Come and get fun readings from others. If you cannot give a reading, it is fine!

January: Hear about Steve's experience working with people to release negative energy in Biloxi, Mississippi after Hurricane Katrina

Also on January 27, we will be hosting the movie, Indigo Evolution! More details to follow, save the date, though! Tickets will be $10.

Please bring a dish of food or a non-alcoholic beverage to share! Be ready for good food, good company and good conversation! Most who come are vegetarians.

For more information, see http://www.placeoflig...
item.name: The Worcester Indigo Children and Parents December Meetup
